description: This Leather Case will securely hold and protect your Amazon Kindle 3. This case will protect your Kindle from scratches, fingerprints, and dust. The leather interior will hold the Kindle securely in place so you can carry the case worry free, and you can also keep it in the case during usage. Use this case for ideal utility, practicality, and protection when using your Kindle 3! The in-built stand function allows you to place the book on a desk, table or any other surface you wish without the need to hold it. The adjustable arm allows a wide range of angles so you can achieve your perfect reading experience
title: Acase Genuine Leather Flip Case for Kindle 3 (Keyboard) with Multiple Position Stand (Black)
